are posting, and not gigantic botnets. Which have become a big problem.

and persons that have a ● account can use it as well. 
I read some other ideas people have, like using p2. Well, p2 does not 
have any benefit for Pink Channel. Only the generous and wonderful people 
and companies that advertise on Pink Channel provide any income that is earned. 
If you are using a dedicated browser you miss out on the ability to see 
some of our fine advertisers. I worry some about depopulation with this 
system, however it is not so aweful, and a simple work around is available.
